duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive new sales and generate opportunities for various types of customers.
Maintain customer contact and manage customer expectations to foster satisfaction.
Educate customers about Motion Industries products through technical presentations.
Increase revenue and profitability through new business generation and developing existing accounts.
Generate new leads through networking, cold calling, and internet research.
Interact face-to-face with customers to foster strong relationships and maintain satisfaction.
Understand complex requirements from customers for preparation of customized quoting.
Deliver effective sales presentations and ensure technical requirements are met.
Assist with on-site troubleshooting of customers' concerns.
Work with and coordinate vendor resources to build relationships and support sales.
Be on-call nights or weekends, depending on need.
